Package com.raylib.jextract

Class RayCollision

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.RayCollision
public class RayCollision extends Object
struct RayCollision {
    _Bool hit;
    float distance;
    Vector3 point;
    Vector3 normal;
}
